aug.desc: Provokes a target to attack during an ordinary physical attack.
Decreases a target's urge to attack during a general physical attack.
Burns up a target's MP during an ordinary physical attack.
Momentarily decreases a target's speed during an ordinary physical attack.
Momentarily decreases a target's Atk. Spd. during an ordinary physical attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of shock during an ordinary physical attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of hold during an ordinary physical attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of sleep during a general physical attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of paralysis during an ordinary physical attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a petrified state during a general physical attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of fear and causes him to flee during a general physical attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a poisoned state during a general physical attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a bleeding state during a general physical attack.
Momentarily blocks the target's magic skill during a general physical attack.
Momentarily blocks all of the target's physical and magic skills during a general physical attack.
Burns up a target's MP during magic use.
Momentarily decreases the target's speed during magic use.
Momentarily decreases the target's Atk. Spd. during magic use.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of shock during magic use.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of hold during magic use.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of sleep during magic use.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of paralysis during magic use.
Momentarily throws the target into a petrified state during magic use.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of fear and causes him to flee during magic use.
Momentarily throws the target into a poisoned state during magic use.
Momentarily throws the target into a bleeding state during magic use.
Momentarily blocks the target's magic skill during magic use.
Momentarily blocks all of the target's physical and magic skills during magic use.
Increases a target's urge to attack during a critical attack.
Decreases a target's urge to attack during a critical attack.
Burns up a target's MP during a critical attack.
Momentarily decreases the target's speed during a critical attack.
Momentarily decreases the target's Atk. Spd. during a critical attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of shock during a critical attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of hold during a critical attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of sleep during a critical attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of paralysis during a critical attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a petrified state during a critical attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of fear and causes him to flee during a critical attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a poisoned state during a critical attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a bleeding state during a critical attack.
Momentarily blocks the target's magic skill during a critical attack.
Momentarily blocks all of the target's physical and magic skills during a critical attack.
Immediately recovers your HP.
Increases the maximum HP.
Increases the maximum HP temporarily and restores HP by the increased amount.
Increases the effectiveness of HP recovery magic temporarily.
Regenerates MP.
Increases the maximum MP.
Increases the recharge recover rate of MP.
Regenerates CP.
Increases the maximum CP.
Increases P. Atk. temporarily.
Increases M. Atk. temporarily.
Increases PVP P. Atk. temporarily.
Increases P. Def. temporarily.
Increases M. Def. temporarily.
Decreases the opponent's PVP P. Atk. temporarily.
Increases the power of HP recovery magic temporarily.
Increases Dodge temporarily.
Increases Accuracy temporarily.
Increases the chance of a critical attack temporarily.
Increases Lung Capacity temporarily.
Increases the height from which you can jump without sustaining damage temporarily.
Increases Resistance to damage from falling.
Teleports the caster to a village. Cannot be used in a specially designated place such as the GM Consultation Service.
Teleports the caster to a village. Cannot be used in a specially designated place such as the GM Consultation Service.
Increases the ability to restore some HP from the damage inflicted on an enemy temporarily. Excludes damage by skill or long-range attacks.
Increases the target's urge to attack.
Decreases a target's urge to attack.
Puts the opponent's mind at peace and erases the desire to attack.
Cancels the target's status.
Absorbs HP.
Burns up the enemy's MP.
Opens level 3 doors with 100% probability and chests below level 72 with 90% probability. Requires 17 Keys of a Thief.
Ignites a firecracker.
Ignites a large firecracker.
Momentarily becomes invincible.
Temporarily blocks a monster's pre-emptive attack. Fighting ability significantly decreases while in effect.
Restores about 0-70% of additional Exp.
Temporarily decreases the MP consumption rate for physical skills.
Temporarily decreases the MP consumption rate for magical skills.
Temporarily decreases the MP consumption rate for song/dance skills.
Temporarily decreases the MP consumption rates for all skills.
Detonates a fireball by compressing the air around the caster.
Unleashes a spray of highly pressurized water.
Creates a whirlwind of destruction.
Attacks the target with a stone boulder.
Unleashes a sacred attack.
Unleashes a dark attack.
Unleashes an elementally challenged attack.
Unleashes a flaming attack against the enemies near a target.
Unleashes a flaming attack against nearby enemies.
Unleashes a powerful liquidy attack against nearby enemies.
Unleashes a powerful gusting attack against nearby enemies.
Unleashes an earthen attack against nearby enemies.
Unleashes a sacred attack against nearby enemies.
Unleashes a dark attack against nearby enemies.
Unleashes an elementally challenged attack against nearby enemies.
Temporarily decreases a target's speed.
Temporarily decreases a target's Atk. Spd.
Temporarily throws the target into a state of shock.
Temporarily throws the target into a state of hold. The target cannot be affected by any additional hold attacks while the effect lasts.
Temporarily throws the target into a state of sleep. The target cannot be affected by any additional sleep attacks while the effect lasts.
Temporarily throws the target into a state of paralysis.
Temporarily throws the target into a petrified state.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of fear and causes him to flee.
Temporarily poisons a target.
Temporarily causes a target to bleed heavily.
Temporarily blocks the target's magic skills.
Temporarily blocks all of the target's physical/magic skills.
Temporarily decreases the re-use time for physical skills.
Temporarily decreases the re-use time for magic skills.
Temporarily decreases the re-use time for song/dance skills.
Temporarily decreases the re-use times for all skills.
Increases your head size.
Allows you to reflect some of the damage you incurred back to the enemy for a certain amount of time. Excludes damage from skill or remote attacks.
Teleports party members to a village. Cannot be used in a specially designated place such as the GM Consultation Service.
Plays music.
Restores your HP by using attack rate.
Increases Max. HP by using attack rate for a certain amount of time.
Increases the effect of HP recovery magic by using attack rate for a certain amount of time.
Restores your MP by using attack rate.
Increases maximum MP when under attack for a certain amount of time.
Increases the recharge recovery rate of MP when under attack.
Restores CP when under attack.
Increases maximum CP when under attack for a certain amount of time.
Increases P. Atk. when under attack temporarily.
Increases M. Atk. when under attack temporarily.
Increases PVP P. Atk. when under attack temporarily.
Increases P. Def. when under attack temporarily.
Increases M. Def. when under attack temporarily.
Decreases the opponent's PVP P. Atk. when you are under attack temporarily.
Increases Evasion when under attack temporarily.
Increases Accuracy when under attack temporarily.
Increases the critical attack rate when under attack temporarily.
Increases the critical attack rate of magic attacks when under attack temporarily.
Decreases the enemy's urge to attack when you are under attack.
Momentarily decreases a target's speed when you are under attack.
Momentarily decreases a target's Atk. Spd. when you are under attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of shock when you are under attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of hold when you are under attack. The target cannot be affected by any additional hold attacks while the effect lasts.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of sleep when you are under attack. The target cannot be affected by any additional sleep attacks while the effect lasts.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of paralysis when you are under attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a petrified state when you are under attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a state of fear and causes him to flee when you are under attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a poisoned state when you are under attack.
Momentarily throws the target into a bleeding state when you are under attack.
Momentarily blocks the target's magic skill when you are under attack.
Momentarily blocks all of the target's physical and magic skills when you are under attack.
Increases the effect of HP recovery magic when equipped.
Increases the recharge recovery rate of MP when equipped.
Increases P. Atk. when equipped.
Increases M. Atk. when equipped.
Increases PvP P. Atk. when equipped.
Increases P. Def. when equipped
Increases M. Def. when equipped.
Increases the power of HP recovery magic when equipped.
Increases Evasion when equipped.
Increases Accuracy when equipped.
Increases critical rate when equipped.
Increases critical rate of magic attacks when equipped.
Increases the weapon weight limit by 2 times when equipped.
Increases lung capacity when equipped.
Increases the height from which you can jump without sustaining damage when equipped.
Increases Resistance to damage from falling when equipped.
Decreases MP consumption for physical skills when equipped.
Decreases MP consumption for magic skills when equipped.
Decreases MP consumption for song/dance skills when equipped.
Decreases MP consumption for all skills when equipped.

Accessory that contains special power.
